name: Balance
flavorText: "We must walk the middle way between chaos and order, and not allow our emotions to sway us." —Tenets of the Veradani
flavorTextHtml: "We must walk the middle way between chaos and order, and not allow our emotions to sway us." —Tenets of the Veradani

secondary.textHtml: The damage of Tempest Rush is increased by 546% and when your Tempest Rush hits 3 or fewer enemies, it gains 100% Critical Hit Chance. (Monk Only) [450 - 600]%
